mapper.insert: insert into ssdeliveryreceipt (delivery_receipt, stary_city, end_city, mid_city, make_dtae, state, comment) values (#{deliveryReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staryCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDtae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ssdeliveryreceipt set stary_city = #{staryCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_city = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_dtae = #{makeDtae,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where delivery_receipt = #{deliveryReceipt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select delivery_receipt, stary_city, end_city, mid_city, make_dtae, state, comment from ssdeliveryreceipt
